message: Let's split it fairly, I'm willing to give you a good deal. Accept this and we can end the game.
I'll match your fairness, but I'm not sure you'll do the same in the next round
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more for myself to make this game worthwhile.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I need something more substantial from you now
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm willing to give you a better deal if you meet me halfway.
I'm not going to give in now, I'll take the majority of the remaining amount
I'm getting low on options, but I'll give you a last chance to make a deal. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to let you walk away with most of the money, I'll take what's left
This is my final offer. I'll give you a tiny share, but I need to walk away with something.
I'll take what's left, you've had plenty of chances to make a deal
Fine, take it all. I'm done negotiating.
